body:
hi every body.happy new year.

when i run simulation just a one zone, is it necessari to  pay attention to adjacency? and if not why i face this eror?

replies.body:
when i run simulation just a one zone, is it necessary to  pay attention to adjacency

No.



It gives you the error since the analysis fails to run. There are couple of mistakes that you are making here and there in the file. I suggest you to use panel and check the inputs and outputs in all the steps.

When you put the surfaces together you need to have them in the same branch. In your case you can just flatten the input. The output of createHBZones should be a list of closedBreps.

When you are using panel to name the surfaces/zones do NOT press enter after writing the name. We can add an extra check for this but in any case you should not have an extra line when you name surfaces/zones.



The components which are changed are grouped so you can see the changes.



Mostapha
thank you.my error solved. but when i using panel to read total energy i face this eror:no collected data.

Hi Maryam- Here are the reasons:

1. You need to set the zone to be conditioned.

2. Heating setpoint cannot be higher than cooling setpoint.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Mostapha
